data.comment: The match has started.
Goal! Ilias Chair gives QPR a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 38, Michael Smith levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 45, QPR have been awarded a penalty...
The first-half has come to a close in London.
Bright Osayi-Samuel puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Ben Wiles for Rotherham has been booked by Oliver Langford and receives a first yellow card.
Lyndon Dykes nets and QPR extend their lead to 3-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 46, Oliver Langford has blown to start the second-half.
Rotherham make their first substitution with Jamie Lindsay replacing Trevor Clarke.
Matt Crooks is on a sub for Daniel Barlaser for Rotherham.
In the minute 59, Matthew Olosunde is replacing Florian Jozefzoon for the away team.
The home team replace Chris Willock with Macauley Bonne.
QPR make their second substitution with Tom Carroll replacing Geoff Cameron.
In the minute 74, Paul Warne is making the team's fourth substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Freddie Ladapo replacing Kyle Vassell.
Albert Adomah is on a sub for Bright Osayi-Samuel for QPR.
Michael Ihiekwe is booked for the away team.
In the minute 84, Freddie Ladapo keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-2.
The away team have replaced Wes Harding with George Hirst. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paul Warne.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
